name: Animated Broom
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.False Object: If the broom is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the broom move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the broom is animate.
traits.Flyby: The broom doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.Multiattack: The broom makes two melee attacks.
actions.Broomstick: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
